landing.bio: I am a Web Developer. I use React and HTML, CSS for the frontend development & NodeJS, ExpressJS, MySQL for backend developement.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for designing and building website for the company.
Designed the website of the company Edison Engineering Enterprises using HTML5/ CSS3/ Bootstrap/ jQuery. Link of the website I made: https://edisonengineering.co.in/

project.name: Break-out Game
project.detail: Developed Paddle Ball Game using pure Javascript. Link : https://rajpriyarj.github.io/Breakout-game/

project.name: REST Api
project.detail: Implemented CRUD operations for enrollment of students in various courses. Used JWT Authentication for verification. Stores data in MySQL.

project.name: Scribble Game
project.detail: Developed a clone to skribble.io using p5 and sockets.io. Designed canvas for drawing images visible to each users playing using socket. Implemented Chat-box for answers.

project.name: Meal Manager
project.detail: Developed the application to reduce food wastage. Designed the Admin Panel using HTML5, CSS3.

project.name: Canteen Automation System
project.detail: Developed the application which can not only save time of customers but also reduces rush on the cash counter. Used HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL, Bootstrap).

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time in making crafts and sketches.
